header.title: News
header.meta: xmlbeans,xmlbeans port to C++, XML, XML Schema, code generator, XML Manipulation, xmlbeansc, xmlbeans++ xmlbeansc++, xmlbeansxx, xmlbeanscxx

section.title: 2008-04-02 - Release 0.9.1
section.p: New version of xmlbeasxx has been released. Binaries and source can be downloaded from SF here.

ul.li: added support for Microsoft Visual Studio compiler

section.title: 2008-02-13 - Release 0.8.13
section.p: New version of xmlbeasxx has been released. Binaries and source can be downloaded from SF here.

section.title: 4th October 2005 - Release 0.7.2
section.p: New version of xmlbeasxx has been released. It contains internal changes that are aimed to get xmlbeansxx closer ot Apache XmlBeans internal solutions. Binaries and source can be downloaded from SF here.

section.title: 13th July 2005 - Article about xmlbeansxx at devx.com
section.p: An article about xmlbeansxx has been posted at www.DevX.com . You can read about using xmlbeansxx here.

section.title: 6th June 2005 - Initial SourceForge release
section.p: The project has been created at SourceForge. The code developed by TouK has been published under open source Apache license. You can download binaries and source here.
